definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: injury, oppression;—abs. [[תּׂךְ]] + [[מִרְמָה]] Ps 10:7, Ps 55:12 (so Gi; Baer [[תּוֹח]]); [[תּוֹח]], + [[חָמָס]] (gloss) Ps 72:14; pl. [[אִישׁ תְּכָּ כִּים]] Pr 29:13 oppressor (Vulgate creditor; cf. [[אישׁ חמסים]] 2Sa 22:49, Ps 140:2, Ps 140:5).—1. [[תּוֹח]] v. [[תָּוֶךְ]].
